judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The order of the court below dismissing the appeal of Joseph S. Kaputa et al., taxpayers, from the Controller’s Forty-ninth Annual Keport of the Fiscal Affairs of Fayette County, Pennsylvania, for the Year Ending December 31, 1959, is affirmed.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel J. Feigus, with him Thomas A. Waggoner, Jr., and Joseph E. Ferens, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Kaputa Appeal.
Argued March 21, 1961.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Anthony Gavalcante, for appellants.
Samuel J. Feigus, with him Thomas A. Waggoner, Jr., and Joseph E. Ferens, for appellees.
April 17, 1961:
